import { useState } from 'react'; const Modification = () => { const [selectedCategory,setSelectedCategory] = useState('Conteneur') const categories = ['Conteneur', 'Catégorie', 'Destination', 'Provenance']; const scrollcarte = { maxHeight:'290px', overflowY:'auto' } const mymargin = { marginRight:'40px' } const handleOnClickCategory = (category) => { setSelectedCategory(category) } return (

Produits

{categories.map(category => (
handleOnClickCategory(category)} > {category}
))}
Type Nom Capacité(en unités) Actions
Congélateur C1 1
) }; export default Modification;
